    Add sample annotations to SummarizedExperiment object

    addSampleAnnots.Rd

    Add sample annotations to SummarizedExperiment object

    addSampleAnnots(sce, sampleAnnot, mergeGroups = list())

    Arguments

    Value

    A SummarizedExperiment object with additional sample annotations.

    Author

    Charlotte Soneson

    Examples

    mqFile <- system.file("extdata", "mq_example", "1356_proteinGroups.txt",
                      package = "einprot")
samples <- c("Adnp_IP04", "Adnp_IP05", "Adnp_IP06",
             "Chd4BF_IP07", "Chd4BF_IP08", "Chd4BF_IP09",
             "RBC_ctrl_IP01", "RBC_ctrl_IP02", "RBC_ctrl_IP03")
out <- importExperiment(inFile = mqFile, iColPattern = "^iBAQ\\.",
                        includeOnlySamples = samples)
sampleAnnot <- data.frame(sample = samples,
                          group = gsub("_IP.*", "", samples))
sce <- addSampleAnnots(out$sce, sampleAnnot = sampleAnnot)
SummarizedExperiment::colData(sce)  ## group information added to sce
#> DataFrame with 9 rows and 3 columns
#>                      sample  group_orig       group
#>                 <character> <character> <character>
#> Adnp_IP04         Adnp_IP04        Adnp        Adnp
#> Adnp_IP05         Adnp_IP05        Adnp        Adnp
#> Adnp_IP06         Adnp_IP06        Adnp        Adnp
#> Chd4BF_IP07   Chd4BF_IP0...      Chd4BF      Chd4BF
#> Chd4BF_IP08   Chd4BF_IP0...      Chd4BF      Chd4BF
#> Chd4BF_IP09   Chd4BF_IP0...      Chd4BF      Chd4BF
#> RBC_ctrl_IP01 RBC_ctrl_I...    RBC_ctrl    RBC_ctrl
#> RBC_ctrl_IP02 RBC_ctrl_I...    RBC_ctrl    RBC_ctrl
#> RBC_ctrl_IP03 RBC_ctrl_I...    RBC_ctrl    RBC_ctrl
